page.title: 07Community Centre
page.content: The Community Centre with Cults Primary School,was officially opened in 1974.It is intended to serve the needs of the local community by providing various facilities.It offers a wide range of social,educational and leisure activities. The running of the centre is undertaken by a management committee, whose membership is composed of centre users acting in a voluntary capacity. Facilities include a coffee-bar which is open Monday-Friday at 10.00am - 4.00pm.Attractively priced snack lunches are available. There is no entrance fee to use the coffee-bar and one does not have to be a centre member to make use of these facilities.
